backend

Class CustomerAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.CustomerAccess

  • public class CustomerAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Class containing methods for accessing and interacting with the database for the customer view.

    • Method Detail

      • getMenu

        public void getMenu()
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method updates menu in the class menu map. (does not return anything as menu map is a singleton. When this method is called, the menu table in the databse will be loaded into menu map.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception

      • placeOrder

        public void placeOrder(java.lang.String orders)
        This method will be for placing orders. It will send data into the database to fill the order table.
        Parameters:
        orders - the orders

      • notifyWaiter

        public void notifyWaiter(java.lang.String message)
        This method will be to store feedback in the database.
        Parameters:
        feedback - the feedback

      • getStatusAndTime

        public java.lang.String getStatusAndTime(java.lang.String orderID)
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method will get the status and last update time for an order.
        Parameters:
        orderID - Unqiue to each order to be used in select query
        Returns:
        returns the status and last update time
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if error with SQL query occurs
